sections.Biography:
===Background===
Lord Thorren seized back the river valley from [[House Whitehill]].

He later fought in [[Robert's Rebellion]] and died at the [[Battle of the Trident]]. When he died his son Gregor succeeded him as Lord of Ironrath.
==="[[Iron From Ice]]"===
MaesterÂ OrtengrynÂ mentions lord Thorren to Ethan that he was the one who seized back the river valleys from the Whitehills and that they called him Thorren the Bold.
